

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_order_max from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_mixed from products where products_id='4' limit 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_order_max from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                      from products_description
                      where products_id = '4'
                      and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'hibekk9184mm1086pq0hrfu214';
